titleStmt.title: A religious inquisition: or, A short scrutinie after religion Wherein the large cope of true religion is narrowly inquired. By Iohn Cope, of Grayes-Inne, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Cope, John, of Gray's Inn.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kingston, and are to be sold by Iames Boler at the Marigold in Paules Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Princeton Theological Seminary. Library.
